sub_title: English and Dutch Language Trainer & Coach
summary:
Thank you for viewing my profile.

I am a highly effective language trainer with more than 15 years of experience as a trainer of Business English in the corporate sector (IT, telecoms, and finance). Cambridge CELTA qualified, I also hold a  CELTA Young Learners Extension diploma. Asides from my activities as an Engish language trainer, I teach Dutch as a 2nd or other language (NT2).

An expert in the areas of both group and individual training courses, I have worked with participants from various business sectors: IT, finance, energy, hydro resources and water management, accountancy, legal, construction, consultancy, HR, food technology and government. 

Additionally, I have been involved in designing and delivering training workshops and have designed, developed, and facilitated training programs, courses, and online learning modules.

Since 2018 I have been involved in the education and training of trainers as a designer and facilitator of Language Partners' Professional Language Trainers Program.

Next to my work with business students, I offer coaching, mentoring and tutoring in English and Dutch language to children and (young) adults. In addition, I have experience in providing group, individual and online/virtual classroom lessons and am a volunteer language buddy for the charity Humanitas.

My skills: 
• Teaching English and Dutch (TESOL/NT2) to adults and young learners (age groups 4-10 and 11-16)
• Designing and delivering individual and group training programs
• Designing and delivering blended learning programs  
• Developing online learning content
• Training, coaching, mentoring and buddying in English and Dutch, classically and online 
• Teacher training (for example, workshops on "Adaptive Learning" and "Group Dynamics and Interaction")
• Learning Needs Analysis
• Planning and coordinating of  training and learning events
• MI Reporting and analysis of learning effectiveness
• Stakeholder Management
